configuration:
<% if @hadoop_security_authentication == "kerberos" %>
yarn.resourcemanager.principal yarn/_HOST@<%= @kerberos_realm %>
yarn.resourcemanager.keytab /etc/yarn.keytab
yarn.web-proxy.principal yarn/_HOST@<%= @kerberos_realm %>
yarn.web-proxy.keytab /etc/yarn.keytab
yarn.nodemanager.principal yarn/_HOST@<%= @kerberos_realm %>
yarn.nodemanager.keytab /etc/yarn.keytab
yarn.nodemanager.container-executor.class org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.nodemanager.LinuxContainerExecutor
yarn.nodemanager.linux-container-executor.group yarn
<% end %>
<% if @hadoop_ps_host %>
yarn.web-proxy.address <%= @hadoop_ps_host %>:<%= @hadoop_ps_port %>
<% end %>
<% if @yarn_resourcemanager_ha_enabled -%>
yarn.resourcemanager.ha.enabled <%= @yarn_resourcemanager_ha_enabled %>
yarn.resourcemanager.cluster-id <%= @yarn_resourcemanager_cluster_id %>
yarn.resourcemanager.ha.rm-ids <%= (1..resourcemanager_hosts.length).map { |n| "rm#{n}" }.join(",") %>
<% resourcemanager_hosts.each_with_index do |host,idx| -%>
yarn.resourcemanager.resource-tracker.address.rm<%= idx+1 %> <%= host %>:<%= @hadoop_rt_port %>
yarn.resourcemanager.address.rm<%= idx+1 %> <%= host %>:<%= @hadoop_rm_port %>
<% if not @hadoop_rm_bind_host.nil? -%>
yarn.resourcemanager.bind-host.rm<%= idx+1 %> <%= @hadoop_rm_bind_host %>
<% end -%>
yarn.resourcemanager.scheduler.address.rm<%= idx+1 %> <%= host %>:<%= @hadoop_sc_port %>
yarn.resourcemanager.admin.address.rm<%= idx+1 %> <%= host %>:<%= @hadoop_rm_admin_port %>
yarn.resourcemanager.webapp.address.rm<%= idx+1 %> <%= host %>:<%= @hadoop_rm_webapp_port %>
<% end -%> <% if @yarn_resourcemanager_zk_address -%>
yarn.resourcemanager.zk-address <%= @yarn_resourcemanager_zk_address %>
<% end -%> <% else -%>
yarn.resourcemanager.resource-tracker.address <%= @hadoop_rm_host %>:<%= @hadoop_rt_port %>
yarn.resourcemanager.address <%= @hadoop_rm_host %>:<%= @hadoop_rm_port %>
<% if not @hadoop_rm_bind_host.nil? -%>
yarn.resourcemanager.bind-host <%= @hadoop_rm_bind_host %>
<% end -%>
yarn.resourcemanager.scheduler.address <%= @hadoop_rm_host %>:<%= @hadoop_sc_port %>
<% end -%>
yarn.nodemanager.aux-services mapreduce_shuffle
yarn.nodemanager.aux-services.mapreduce_shuffle.class org.apache.hadoop.mapred.ShuffleHandler
yarn.nodemanager.env-whitelist JAVA_HOME,HADOOP_COMMON_HOME,HADOOP_HDFS_HOME,HADOOP_CONF_DIR,CLASSPATH_PREPEND_DISTCACHE,HADOOP_YARN_HOME,HADOOP_MAPRED_HOME
yarn.log-aggregation-enable true
<% if @yarn_log_server_url %>
yarn.log.server.url <%= @yarn_log_server_url %>
<% end %>
yarn.dispatcher.exit-on-error true
yarn.nodemanager.local-dirs <%= @yarn_data_dirs.join(",") %> true
Where to store container logs. yarn.nodemanager.log-dirs /var/log/hadoop-yarn/containers
Where to aggregate logs to. yarn.nodemanager.remote-app-log-dir /var/log/hadoop-yarn/apps
<% if not @yarn_nodemanager_vmem_check_enabled.nil? -%>
yarn.nodemanager.vmem-check-enabled <%= @yarn_nodemanager_vmem_check_enabled %>
<% end -%>
Classpath for typical applications. yarn.application.classpath
$HADOOP_CONF_DIR, $HADOOP_COMMON_HOME/*,$HADOOP_COMMON_HOME/lib/*, $HADOOP_HDFS_HOME/*,$HADOOP_HDFS_HOME/lib/*, $HADOOP_MAPRED_HOME/*,$HADOOP_MAPRED_HOME/lib/*, $HADOOP_YARN_HOME/*,$HADOOP_YARN_HOME/lib/*
<% if @yarn_scheduler_minimum_allocation_mb -%>
yarn.scheduler.minimum-allocation-mb <%= @yarn_scheduler_minimum_allocation_mb %>
<% end -%> <% if @yarn_scheduler_maximum_allocation_mb -%>
yarn.scheduler.maximum-allocation-mb <%= @yarn_scheduler_maximum_allocation_mb %>
<% end -%> <% if @yarn_nodemanager_resource_memory_mb -%>
yarn.nodemanager.resource.memory-mb <%= @yarn_nodemanager_resource_memory_mb %>
<% end -%> <% if @yarn_resourcemanager_scheduler_class -%>
yarn.resourcemanager.scheduler.class <%= @yarn_resourcemanager_scheduler_class %>
<% end -%>
yarn.nodemanager.vmem-pmem-ratio 100
